column4: how do i change my resolution?. i change it in "nvidia X setting" but everytime i restart my pc it changes back :/
restarted PC, back to old resolution
did you click the "Save to xorg" button after making the change in nvidia-settings?
yes. i got a different error this time
when i click save i get this "unable to create new X config backup file '/etc/X11/xorg.conf.backup'."
mv: cannot stat `xorg.conf.backup': No such file or directory
are you in the /etc/X11 directory when you run that command?
are you running nvidia-settings with the command "gksu nvidia-settings" or gksudo (same thing)
worked now ^_^ let me restart. ty
